name: Pangaea (Doge)
description:
Play as Pangaea before they were a supercontinent!

Explore the ocean and find the other segments of Pangaea as you know it and convince them to join you!

Start game & talk: SPACE

Move: ARROW KEYS

Other elements: MOUSE CLICK

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021

Programming: Finn & Josh

Art: Rachel

Dialogue: Cian
